12 trace_list = [common.TRACE_FILE_SYSTEM, common.TRACE_FILE_TASKS, common.TRACE_FILE_FREQUENCY, common.TRACE_FILE_PES, common.TRACE_FILE_TEMPERATURE, common.TRACE_FILE_LOAD, common.TRACE_FILE_TEMPERATURE_WORKLOAD]
13 
14 def update_PE_utilization_and_info(PE, current_timestamp):
15  '''!
16  Update the PE utilization.
17  @param PE: PE to be evaluated
18  @param current_timestamp: Current timestamp
19  '''
20  lower_bound = current_timestamp-common.sampling_rate # Find the lower bound for the time window_list under consideration
21 
22  completed_info = []
23  running_info = []
24  for task in common.TaskQueues.completed.list:
25  #print('Time %s:'%current_timestamp, task.start_time, task.finish_time, task.PE_ID)
26  if task.PE_ID == PE.ID:
27  if ((task.start_time < lower_bound) and (task.finish_time < lower_bound)):
28  continue
29  elif ((task.start_time < lower_bound) and (task.finish_time >= lower_bound)):
30  completed_info.append(lower_bound)
31  completed_info.append(task.finish_time)
32  else:
33  completed_info.append(task.start_time)
34  completed_info.append(task.finish_time)
35  #print('Time %s:'%current_timestamp,'completed',completed_info, 'Task', task.ID, 'PE', PE.ID)
36 
37  for task in common.TaskQueues.running.list:
38  #print('Time %s:'%current_timestamp, task.start_time, task.PE_ID)
39  if task.PE_ID == PE.ID:
40  if (task.start_time < lower_bound):
41  running_info.append(lower_bound)
42  else:
43  running_info.append(task.start_time)
44  task_start_time = task.start_time
45  running_info.append(current_timestamp)
46  #print('Time %s:'%current_timestamp,'running',running_info, 'Task', task.ID, 'PE', PE.ID)
47  merged_list = completed_info + running_info
48  # get the utilization for the PE
49  sum_of_active_times = sum([merged_list[i*2+1] - merged_list[i*2] for i in range(int(len(merged_list)/2))])
50  PE.utilization = (sum_of_active_times/common.sampling_rate) / PE.capacity
51  # print(PE.ID, PE.utilization)
52 
53  full_list = [PE.ID, PE.utilization, current_timestamp]
54  info_list = [0 if i > (len(merged_list)-1) else merged_list[i] for i in range(12)]
55  full_list.extend(info_list)
56 
57  PE.info = info_list
58 
59  # if (common.DEBUG_SIM):
60  # print('Time %s: for PE-%d'%(current_timestamp,PE.ID),PE.info)
61 
62 
63 def trace_frequency(timestamp):
64  '''!
65  Trace method for saving the frequency variations.
66  @param timestamp: Current timestamp
67  '''
68  if (common.TRACE_FREQUENCY):
69  create_header = False
70  if not (os.path.exists(common.TRACE_FILE_FREQUENCY)):
71  # Create the CSV header
72  create_header = True
73  with open(common.TRACE_FILE_FREQUENCY, 'a', newline='') as csvfile:
74  trace = csv.writer(csvfile, delimiter=',')
75  if create_header == True:
76  header_list = ['Timestamp']
77  for idx, current_cluster in enumerate(common.ClusterManager.cluster_list):
78  if current_cluster.type != "MEM":
79  header_list.append('f_PE_' + str(idx))
80  header_list.append('N_PE_' + str(idx))
81  trace.writerow(header_list)
82  data = [timestamp]
83  for idx, current_cluster in enumerate(common.ClusterManager.cluster_list):
84  if current_cluster.type != "MEM":
85  data.append(current_cluster.current_frequency / 1000)
86  data.append(current_cluster.num_active_cores)
87  trace.writerow(data)
88 
89 def trace_tasks(task, PE, task_time, total_energy):
90  '''!
91  Trace method for saving statistics about the tasks.
92  @param task: Task to be traced
93  @param PE: Current PE
94  @param task_time: Task's execution time
95  @param total_energy: Task's total energy consumption
96  '''
97  if (common.TRACE_TASKS):
98  create_header = False
99  if not (os.path.exists(common.TRACE_FILE_TASKS.split(".")[0] + "__" + str(common.trace_file_num) + ".csv")):
100  # Create the CSV header
101  create_header = True
102  with open(common.TRACE_FILE_TASKS.split(".")[0] + "__" + str(common.trace_file_num) + ".csv", 'a', newline='') as csvfile:
103  trace = csv.writer(csvfile, delimiter=',')
104  if create_header == True:
105  trace.writerow(['DVFS policy', 'Task ID', 'PE', 'Exec. Time (us)', 'Energy (J)'])
106  trace.writerow([common.ClusterManager.cluster_list[PE.cluster_ID].DVFS, task.ID, common.ClusterManager.cluster_list[PE.cluster_ID].name, task_time, total_energy])
107 
108 def trace_system():
109  '''!
110  Trace method for saving statistics related to the system, i.e., the whole simulation.
111  '''
112  if (common.TRACE_SYSTEM):
113  create_header = False
114  if not (os.path.exists(common.TRACE_FILE_SYSTEM.split(".")[0] + "__" + str(common.trace_file_num) + ".csv")):
115  # Create the CSV header
116  create_header = True
117  with open(common.TRACE_FILE_SYSTEM.split(".")[0] + "__" + str(common.trace_file_num) + ".csv", 'a', newline='') as csvfile:
118  trace = csv.writer(csvfile, delimiter=',')
119  if create_header == True:
120  trace.writerow(['Job List', 'DVFS mode', 'N_little', 'N_big', 'Exec. Time (us)', 'Cumulative Exec. Time (us)', 'Energy (J)'])
121  DVFS_mode_list = []
122  for DVFS_config in common.DVFS_cfg_list:
123  if DVFS_config == "performance":
124  DVFS_mode_list.append("P")
125  elif DVFS_config == "powersave":
126  DVFS_mode_list.append("LP")
127  elif DVFS_config == "ondemand":
128  DVFS_mode_list.append("OD")
129  elif str(DVFS_config).startswith("constant"):
130  split = str(DVFS_config).split('-')
131  DVFS_mode_list.append("C" + split[1])
132  if common.simulation_mode == "validation":
133  trace.writerow([common.current_job_list, DVFS_mode_list, common.gen_trace_capacity_little, common.gen_trace_capacity_big,
134  common.results.execution_time, common.results.execution_time, common.results.energy_consumption])
135  elif common.simulation_mode == "performance":
136  if len(common.job_list) == 1:
137  job_list = common.current_job_list
138  else:
139  job_list = common.job_list
140  trace.writerow([job_list, DVFS_mode_list, common.gen_trace_capacity_little, common.gen_trace_capacity_big,
141  common.results.execution_time - common.warmup_period, common.results.cumulative_exe_time,
142  common.results.cumulative_energy_consumption])
143 
144 def trace_PEs(timestamp, PE):
145  '''!
146  Trace method for saving statistics related to the PEs.
147  @param timestamp: Current timestamp
148  @param PE: PE to be traced
149  '''
150  if (common.TRACE_PES):
151  create_header = False
152  if not (os.path.exists(common.TRACE_FILE_PES)):
153  # Create the CSV header
154  create_header = True
155  with open(common.TRACE_FILE_PES, 'a', newline='') as csvfile:
156  dataset = csv.writer(csvfile, delimiter=',')
157  if create_header == True:
158  dataset.writerow(['Timestamp', 'PE', 'Info'])
159  dataset.writerow([timestamp, PE.ID, PE.info])
160 
161 def trace_temperature(timestamp):
162  '''!
163  Trace method for saving the temperature variations.
164  @param timestamp: Current timestamp
165  '''
166  if (common.TRACE_TEMPERATURE):
167  create_header = False
168  if not (os.path.exists(common.TRACE_FILE_TEMPERATURE)):
169  # Create the CSV header
170  create_header = True
171  with open(common.TRACE_FILE_TEMPERATURE, 'a', newline='') as csvfile:
172  dataset = csv.writer(csvfile, delimiter=',')
173  if create_header == True:
174  dataset.writerow(['Timestamp', 'Snippet', 'Temperature', 'Throttling_state'])
175  dataset.writerow([timestamp, common.current_job_list, max(common.current_temperature_vector), common.throttling_state])
176 
177 def trace_load(timestamp, PEs):
178  '''!
179  Trace method for saving the load variations
180  @param timestamp: Current timestamp
181  @param PEs: List of PEs
182  '''
183  if (common.TRACE_LOAD):
184  create_header = False
185  if not (os.path.exists(common.TRACE_FILE_LOAD)):
186  # Create the CSV header
187  create_header = True
188  with open(common.TRACE_FILE_LOAD, 'a', newline='') as csvfile:
189  dataset = csv.writer(csvfile, delimiter=',')
190  if create_header == True:
191  header_list = ['Timestamp', 'Snippet']
192  for idx, current_cluster in enumerate(common.ClusterManager.cluster_list):
193  if current_cluster.type != "MEM":
194  header_list.append('N_tasks_PE_' + str(idx))
195  header_list.append('N_tasks_total')
196  dataset.writerow(header_list)
197  data = [timestamp, common.current_job_list]
198  total_num_tasks = 0
199  for idx, current_cluster in enumerate(common.ClusterManager.cluster_list):
200  if current_cluster.type != "MEM":
201  num_tasks = get_num_tasks_being_executed(current_cluster, PEs)
202  data.append(num_tasks)
203  total_num_tasks += num_tasks
204  data.append(total_num_tasks)
205  dataset.writerow(data)
206 
207 def get_current_job_list():
208  '''!
209  Get the current snippet.
210  @return Current snippet
211  '''
212  # Get the current job list based on the snippet ID while injecting jobs
213  if common.job_list != []:
214  return common.job_list[common.snippet_ID_exec]
215  else:
216  return common.job_list
217 
218 def get_num_tasks_being_executed(cluster, PEs):
219  '''!
220  Get the number of tasks that are being executed.
221  @param cluster: Current cluster
222  @param PEs: List of PEs
223  @return Number of tasks being executed
224  '''
225  # Get the number of tasks currently being executed in the cluster
226  num_tasks = 0
227  for PE_ID in cluster.PE_list:
228  if not PEs[PE_ID].idle:
229  num_tasks += 1
230  return num_tasks
231 
232 def get_cluster_utilization(cluster, PEs):
233  '''!
234  Get the cluster utilization.
235  @param cluster: Current cluster
236  @param PEs: List of PEs
237  @return Cluster utilization
238  '''
239  # Get the cluster utilization
240  utilization = 0
241  for PE_ID in cluster.PE_list:
242  utilization += PEs[PE_ID].utilization
243  return utilization / len(cluster.PE_list)
244 
245 def clean_traces():
246  '''!
247  Remove old trace files.
248  '''
249  for trace_name in trace_list:
250  if os.path.exists(trace_name):
251  os.remove(trace_name)
252  # Remove old traces generated in parallel
253  for trace_name in trace_list:
254  file_list = fnmatch.filter(os.listdir('.'), trace_name.split(".")[0] + '__*.csv')
255  for f in file_list:
256  os.remove(f)
257 
258 def clean_policies():
259  '''!
260  Remove old policy files.
261  '''
262  file_list = fnmatch.filter(os.listdir('.'), '*.pkl')
263  for f in file_list:
264  os.remove(f)
265 
266 def init_variables_at_sim_start() :
267  '''!
268  Initialize config variables.
269  '''
270  common.snippet_start_time = common.warmup_period
271  common.snippet_ID_inj = -1
272  common.snippet_ID_exec = 0
273  common.snippet_throttle = -1
274  common.snippet_temp_list = []
275  common.snippet_initial_temp = [common.T_ambient,
276  common.T_ambient,
277  common.T_ambient,
278  common.T_ambient,
279  common.T_ambient]
280  common.current_temperature_vector = [common.T_ambient, # Indicate the current PE temperature for each hotspot
281  common.T_ambient,
282  common.T_ambient,
283  common.T_ambient,
284  common.T_ambient]
285  common.B_model = []
286  common.job_counter_list = [0]*len(common.current_job_list)
287  common.throttling_state = -1
